overview: Mateo (16) goes through a confused homosexual and psychic awakening. The spirit of Rosa (40), his mother, tries to say goodbye but he doesn't let her. When Carmen (70s), his grandmother, is admitted to the hospital, Mateo establishes a bizarre relationship with the spirit of Enrique (18), who has just committed suicide. These encounters will lead him to experience and cross the fine line between love, life and death.
title: Aviones de papel
